wordGroup: glacier national park 冰河国家公园；国家冰川公园（美国）

sentences.en: A liquid layer forms at the base of the glacier.
sentences.cn: 在冰川的底部形成了一层液体。

sentences.en: Friction between the glacier and bedrock is reduced.
sentences.cn: 冰川和基岩之间的摩擦减少了。

sentences.en: The first type of glacier flow is called: basal slip.
sentences.cn: 第一种冰川流动被称为：基底滑动。
